definition: associated with men and not with women, a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to males or to objects classified as male
details:
adjective
- associated with men and not with women
- of grammatical gender
= synonyms: feminine, neuter
- (music or poetry) ending on an accented beat or syllable
= example: (music or poetry) ending on an accented beat or syllable
noun
- a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to males or to objects classified as male
